content: here is a fun project i did as a promotional pattern for my book topsy-turvy inside out knit toys 1 the egg to turtle pattern is not included in the book if you like this toy i hope you ll check out my book topsy-turvy knit toys 2 filled with two more reversible egg to alligator 3 and egg to penguin 4 pattern projects and many more reversible topsy-turvy toys and the egg to bluebird 5 from itty-bitty toys 6 click here to check out topsy-turvy inside out knit toys 7 the pattern is featured in a segment i did for knitting daily tv series 1200 with vickie howell enjoy susan 1 http //www amazon com/topsy-turvy-inside-out-knit-toys-two-/dp/1579654606/ref=sr_1_1 ie=utf8&qid=1355672477&sr=8-1&keywords=topsy+turvy+inside+out 2 http //www amazon com/topsy-turvy-inside-out-knit-toys-two-/dp/1579654606/ref=sr_1_1 ie=utf8&qid=1355672477&sr=8-1&keywords=topsy+turvy+inside+out 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/egg-to-alligator 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/egg-to-penguin 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/egg-to-bluebird-and-a-little-nest-too 6 http //www amazon com/itty-bitty-toys-animals-dolls-playthings/dp/1579653766/ref=pd_bxgy_b_img_y 7 http //www amazon com/topsy-turvy-inside-out-knit-toys-two-/dp/1579654606/ref=sr_1_1 ie=utf8&qid=1355672477&sr=8-1&keywords=topsy+turvy+inside+out
